meanings.definition: Either of the two round fleshy parts that form the lower rear area of the human trunk.
meanings.sent1: She sat on the hard wooden chair, feeling the pressure on her right buttock.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's movements emphasized the strength and flexibility of her buttocks.
meanings.sent3: During the comedy show, the actor slipped on a banana peel and landed right on his buttock.
meanings.sent4: The sun setting behind the hill cast a warm glow on the rolling buttocks of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor carefully chiseled the marble to capture the smooth curve of the buttock.

meanings.definition: A single one of these parts.
meanings.sent1: He winced as the doctor injected the anesthetic directly into his left buttock.
meanings.sent2: The toddler proudly showed off the sticker on her buttock after visiting the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully pounced on the toy mouse, swatting it with her fluffy buttock.
meanings.sent4: The lone tree on the hill stood tall, its buttock facing the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a detailed portrait, capturing the dimples on the model's buttock.
